headline: 4 Dividend-Paying Dow Jones Growth Stocks to Buy in June and Hold for Decades
summary: Apple could be heavily impacted by tariffs, but the long-term investment thesis is sound.  Microsoft continues to fire on all cylinders and deserves to be near an all-time high.  Visa and American Express benefit from network effects that help them steadily grow over time.
